description: Detects Windows Webshells that use GET requests via access logs
false_positives: Web sites like wikis with articles on os commands and pages that include the os commands in the URLs
User searches in search boxes of the respective website
name: Windows Webshell Strings
query: (http.request.method:"GET" AND (*\=whoami* OR *\=net%20user* OR *\=cmd%20\/c%20* OR *\=powershell%20* OR *\=tasklist%20* OR *\=wmic%20* OR *\=ssh%20* OR *\=python%20* OR *\=ipconfig* OR *\=wget%20* OR *\=curl%20* OR *\=certutil* OR *\=copy%20%5C%5C*))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali
